title: How to Unlock the Toaster in the Tub Achievement in Bioshock

steps.headline: Start playing BioShock and begin the Welcome To Rapture level, which acts as a kind of tutorial.
steps.description: You won't have to advance far in the level before you get a chance to earn the achievement.

steps.headline: Acquire the Electro Bolt plasmid.
steps.description: This is found at the beginning of the game during the Welcome To Rapture level after you leave the submarine in a small room.

steps.headline: Equip the Electro Bolt by pressing the Left Trigger on your Xbox 360 controller or selecting it from the plasmid wheel if you have more than one by pressing and holding the Left Bumper.
steps.description: It is represented by a hand with electricity coming from it.

steps.headline: Move through the level until you reach an area with two splicers in a substantial amount of water.
steps.description: There are several locations like this throughout the level, but there will be one where Atlas prompts you to electrocute them.

steps.headline: Aim your cross-hair with the Electro Bolt equipped at either one of the enemy splicers or the water itself and fire by pressing the Left Trigger.
steps.description: This will result in you shocking them in the water. For a longer effect, hold down the Left Trigger.

steps.headline: Check your Xbox 360 gamerscore and achievement statistics and you will see that the Toaster in the Tub achievement has been unlocked for 10 gamerscore.
steps.description: It is represented by a grey toaster.

text: Start playing BioShock and begin the Welcome To Rapture level, which acts as a kind of tutorial. You won't have to advance far in the level before you get a chance to earn the achievement. Acquire the Electro Bolt plasmid. This is found at the beginning of the game during the Welcome To Rapture level after you leave the submarine in a small room. Equip the Electro Bolt by pressing the Left Trigger on your Xbox 360 controller or selecting it from the plasmid wheel if you have more than one by pressing and holding the Left Bumper. It is represented by a hand with electricity coming from it. Move through the level until you reach an area with two splicers in a substantial amount of water. There are several locations like this throughout the level, but there will be one where Atlas prompts you to electrocute them. Aim your cross-hair with the Electro Bolt equipped at either one of the enemy splicers or the water itself and fire by pressing the Left Trigger. This will result in you shocking them in the water. For a longer effect, hold down the Left Trigger. Check your Xbox 360 gamerscore and achievement statistics and you will see that the Toaster in the Tub achievement has been unlocked for 10 gamerscore. It is represented by a grey toaster.
